title: How can I find loading adress of eCos image
content:
Hey guys Im trying to find loading address (entry point of my program) for this binary, which is part off this firmware. Im trying to load it inside of IDA, how can I correctly load it, how to find entry point address? Here's 
binwalk

comments.text: the "binary" you linked is just a text script  with uboot commands

Thank you for investigating binary and helping out but I also find this     binwalk -Y 7101C     DECIMAL       HEXADECIMAL     DESCRIPTION -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 840           0x348           MIPS executable code, 32/64-bit, little endian, at least 1250 valid instructions

The 7101C has MIPS code, yes, but not the 
usb_backup_upgrade.bin
in the first link.
Yes usb_backup_upgrade.bin contain boot loader and firmware 7101C is part of usb_backup_upgrade.bin
